name: A Lone Crewman
description:
Proudly presenting our Ludum Dare 39 game called : A Lone Crewman!  

A game in which you stole an enemy prototype ship and your task is to:

- Get it Home.
- Don't slow down or they will catch you.

- Don't get destroyed by sentry drones along the way.

- Avoid asteroids.

- Get energy from the Reactor to each Room or else they will stops working.

- If your Shield HP reaches 0 your ship is dead.

- Energy is regenerating slowly in power generator so you have to carefully control ship’s energy.
